findings.title: Use of SafeMath library for Solidity version greater than 0.8
findings.description: Using SafeMath library is unnecessary for Solidity versions greater than 0.8 as overflow/underflow checks are implemented at the language level.

findings.title: Insecure claim function logic
findings.description: The claim function logic can be improved by adding a nonce value inside the Merkle tree leaf to simplify condition statements when a user has few signed leaves.

findings.title: Lack of deadline field in Merkle tree leaf structure
findings.description: The signed amount of tokens has no deadline, allowing users to claim at any time and obliging the admin to track assigned amounts indefinitely. Including a deadline timestamp in the Merkle tree leaf structure would provide flexibility in managing token assignment deadlines.

findings.title: Zero value token transaction
findings.description: The contract allows zero value token transactions when a user claims tokens for the second time or more, resulting in zero tokens being transferred to the user.
